I'm waiting for Minime to reply to Mangus and everyone before I reply 
with Ramulus and co. He has lots of chars in this conflict, so I
don't 
think it'd be fair to continue without him.

::Slayer::

Slayer growls as Lunarpine insults him, firing again at the enemy 
wolf. Lunarpine's punch severs one of the connections to Slayer's 
jetpack, the device losing power. Not enough strength to keep two
bots 
in the air, the jetpack burns at its maximum, but the two bots begin 
decending.

Slayer takes hold of Lunarpine's arm, attempting to dislodge the bot. 
Somehow, this Maximal seemed familiar to him, like he had met him 
before, perhaps in a past life. Shaking those thoughts aside, Slayer 
continues to try to dislodge Lunarpine.

Omega" (The

new

begin.

he
